1375200.name: Noda Full
1375200.description:
Noda is a space to build and share 3D mental models – mind maps, storyboards, network or flow diagrams, project plans – to enhance productivity, understanding and awareness.

Noda Full offers advanced features including:

  • Speech-to-text - reduce barriers to flow and quickly turn your thoughts into mental maps
  • Alternate high-quality environments including a modern art gallery and warehouse / hangar
  • Additional music options with binaural beats for increased focus, concentration and motivation
  • Unlimited nodes and saved maps
  • Ability to use custom images in your maps and export screenshots
